experiences: Implemented a Seq2Seq model using a multi-headed attention-based transformer to generate new company-based column names.

Used NodeJS, JavaScript and MongoDB to fetch data from different departments to generate an integrated report for the entire team.
Created a frontend for aesthetic display of reports using React, HTML and CSS and deployed the application to AWS.

Educated patients and their parents on the importance of dental hygiene and techniques of proper dental and medical care.
